t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    s = input()
    l = len(s)
    n = l//2
    ans = ''
    for i in range(n):
        ans += s[i]
        ans += s[l-1-i]
    if l%2:
        ans += s[n]
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    b = input()
    a = b[0]
    for j in range(1, len(b)):
        if b[j] != a[-1]:
            a += b[j]
    print(a)
